file_content.text: Every move we make, Ulgo's got forces there waiting for us. I don't understand it.
I do. Take a look at the formations sent from High Command. Anything look familiar?
But... they're identical to Ulgo's movements. How did they get a hold of our battle plans?
Bouris Ulgo's got a good memory. Our tactics haven't changed since his days as a general.
I'll contact Command for new orders. Looks like we're fighting ourselves out here.
